recipeInstructions.text: Season scallops with salt and pepper; dust with pan-searing flour. Heat olive oil in pan on medium-high; add scallops. Sear until golden brown (2-3 minutes). Turn scallops.
Reduce heat to medium-low. Cook for 2-3 minutes, until internal temperature reaches 120F.
Add butter and baste scallops for 1-2 minutes until internal temp reaches 130F. Let scallops rest for 2 minutes.
